Basileonecta Hutchinson, 1940: 355
( type species:
Sigara scutellaris Stål, 1858
, by original designation).

Species of this subgenus occur in Africa, Madagascar , and Asia ( Hutchinson 1940 ). There is still no formal checklist of species of
Basileonecta
as of yet. In Asia, there are three species,
M. scutellaris ( Stål, 1858 )
,
M. sedula Horváth, 1905
, and
M. siva (Kirkaldy, 1897)
; all are present in Vietnam .
